Package com.xmljson.converters

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    XMLJSONConverterI
    This interface provides methods that are required for creating a converter from XML to JSON.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConverterFactory
    Factory class for creating instances of XMLJSONConverterI.
    TestXMLJSONConverter
    Test class for XMLJSONConverter
    Utilities
    Utilities Class contains methods for file read/write and Json reading and xml from json conversion.
    XMLJSONConverter
    Implements the XMLJSONConverterI Interface Used for converting JSON to XML
